posts.post_title: FS T206 Red Cobb PSA 2.5 Centered Beauty! No longer available
posts.post_content:
Net to me Keeping, includes Insured Shipping (USPS, UPS, FedEx, we can discuss)

PM or Email me if you are interested in purchasing or have any questions, [url]jceru8600@aol.com[/url]

This card has amazing eye appeal. A smidge off left to right.  My PSA 4 wishes it was as nice.  I can't keep both or could I?

Lets give this a go. Full disclosure, this card is on its way back from PSA after the review process did not change the grade.

I'm going to keep it, for now, thanks for your inputs.

Thanks, Joe
that is one of the nicest 2.5's ive ever seen. good luck, fantastic card
I admire the full disclosure.  Good show, old chap!  :cool:

Wow that is a beauty! 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

I am curious - after the review process did they give you a gauge of why the grade of 2.5? Or did they just pass it back to you along with the $100 fee (or whatever they are charging for that service level?

Kind of surprised they didnt give it the bump and then upcharge you the difference!  Savages!
